config.script:
username = self.getSibling('Username Group').getChild('Username').props.text
	password = self.getSibling('Password Group').getChild('Password').props.text

	valid = 0
	reqRole = "High Voltage"
	roles = system.security.getUserRoles(username, password)

	if reqRole in roles:
	   self.parent.custom.authenticationOK = "true" 
	   self.getSibling("Status").props.text = "Authentication Successful"
	else:
	 	self.parent.custom.authenticationOK = "false"
	 	self.getSibling("Status").props.text = "Authentication Failed!"

  	self.getSibling('Username Group').getChild('Username').props.text = ""
   	self.getSibling('Password Group').getChild('Password').props.text = "" 
   	self.getSibling('Status').position.display = "true"
